title: (3750) Águeda - 30 Rua 5 de Outubro
description: Small parking lot along the road without services ideal for visiting the magnificent city (the sky project). and eat a good homemade ice cream 5 euros for 2 scoops but really excellent. I think it's possible to sleep there but it's not the goal it's only to visit.

title: (3750) Águeda - 30 Rua Anunciação Helena
description: Large parking at the edge of the water and close to the city. Looks rather calm. Fountain not far Suitable for large size

title: (3750) Águeda - 55 Rua Rio Grande
description: Full service station together with 3 motorhomes flat asphalted leveled P, illuminated but without shadow, just aside main road (noisy :-( ), near fire station and easy walking till ÁGUEDA town center every kind of shopping and riverside. Attention ⚠ : every Saturday morning there is the big market in this area. Shops are closed (and good small nice restaurants too...).

title: (3750) Agueda - Rua dos Comerciantes
description: Simple yet spacious parking lot. Levelled ground

title: (3750-064) Águeda - N230
description: On the N230 a few kilometers after Agueda towards Caramuso. Small fluvial park of Bolfiar, to take the small way well lady 'in slope with height of the bar restaurant on the right before the bridge. Riverside with tables, benches and barbecue. Possible to sleep. More for van or small motorhome less than 7M.

title: (3750) - Rua Pateira
description: Parking surrounded by greenery, with a beautiful lawn and picnic tables, two wooden walkways that lead to two gazebos to enjoy the view! It is possible to take walks along the hearths and fish for shrimp species much loved by the Chinese. Quiet place with toilet and trash! Great for those looking for shade and wanting to relax.

title: (3750) Óis da Ribeira - 78 Rua Pateira
description: Public park just to touch the lake.  precise place where we have spent 3 campers without problems.  There is a fountain nearby.  There are no more services.  beautiful place for dotmir

title: (3750-439) Fermentelos - 84 Rua Pateira
description: Place with lots of space, on the edge of a large natural lake, the "Pateira de Fermentelos". Snack tables, cold water fountain, shade, walking routes, fishing, etc. No services.

title: (3750) Fermentelos - Rua Salgada
description: Spot for one campervan under a tree between the road and the lake. It's not a busy road, and it's very quiet at night. It's almost level. The only thing is there are a lot of churches around, so you can hear bells all the time. Otherwise it's a beautiful view of the lake.

title: (3750) Segadães - 1838 Rua Professor Fernando Bessa
description: Merendas Park ideal for picnic barbecue table calm ...

title: (3750) Fermentelos - 45 Rua Minhoteira
description: The first place already indicated was too windy so we stayed here. Nice view on the lake. There is a road next to this place but not very busy. We had quiet night and beautifull morning.

title: (3750) Castanheira do Vouga - 912 N336
description: Fluvial Park and Praia da Redonda car park, day and night in River Park on the banks of the river Águeda. With Pic-NIC tables and barbecues available. Very pleasant and very cool place. Very quiet nights and no noise. Exceptional location that must be preserved.

title: (3750) Fermentelos - 32-36 Rua Minhoteira
description: Lake side spot. We stayed over night with no problem. Very quiet wonderful location

title: (3750) Águeda - R. Vela
description: 2-seater area for large motorhome. 2 spaces for small motorhomes. Typical village, friendly neighborhood. You will find a bistro there which is a friendly boss, a former German Swiss worker. Beautiful bells which stops at 10 am.

title: (3750) Fermentelos - 60 Rua Escola
description: Water source

title: (3750) Fermentelos - Tv Cepo Mouro
description: Rather flat grass pitch, access not recommended for large DCs because of low branches. 3/4 pitches. Quiet place with observatory for birds on the pond. Walkers on weekends, nothing on weekdays. We cleaned the place when we arrived, please leave it clean.

name: Club De Camping And Caravanning De Aguada De Baixo
title: (3750-064) Club De Camping And Caravanning De Aguada De Baixo
title_short: (3750-064) Club De Camping And Caravanning De Aguada De Baixo
description: Nice campsite with swimming pool, quiet, trees.

title: (3750) Fermentelos -
description: Small spot beside the road, right by the lake. A lot of people fishing here, so I believe you can't really stay here for that long. But it's definitely fine for a night.

title: (3750) Lamas do Vouga - N1
description: Convenient area attached to the road. We stopped to cook and nobody told us anything, we ate on the picnic tables under the trees. The only flaw: enough noise from cars and trucks passing very close. Nice for a quick stop.

title: (3750) Fermentelos -
description: Nice and quiet place to spend a night or two. Surrounded by nature. Only a few passage on weekdays, there is a nice trail to follow from here. Accessible by a pretty good dirt track

title: (3800) Pateira do Carregal - Rua do Serrado
title_short: (3800) Pateira do Carregal - Rua do Serrado
description:
Motorhome parking,
 Pic nic area, camper and autocaravana parking for 48h.

description:
New –
Private motorhome park fully fenced with automatic access  control, showers, toilets, water and Living room. 

Check the photos and see that we offer many services in a quiet place
, surrounded with nature and farm animals   

For late check-in please call before 20 PM
Near Aveiro motorway exit

title: (3770) Oliveira do Bairro - Unnamed Road

title: (3770) Oiã - IP1

Beutiful river beach surrounded by nature. with i think only in the summer.
place to Park and sleep. very quiet and calm

title: (3780-351) Anadia - 3338 IC2
description: Picnic spot by the side of the road. Tables, barbecue, sink, wc and water tap. sandwich shop closed during my visit.

title: (3750) Sever do Vouga -
description: Enchanting place to relax and spend time, the ground is sandy but with the 4x4 you can access without problems. LEAVE IT CLEAN!

title: (3850) Albergaria-a-Velha -
description: Along the river, large flat area recommended by locals which helped us get out of the sand in the offroad spot further down the trail

title: (3800) Granja de Baixo - 77 Rua Valinho
description: Natural source: Fonte de Nossa Señora da Guia. very good drinking water. Many locals get their water here. The place is nothing to write home about, but nice, quiet and rural in the middle of nature. Close to Aveiro if you want to visit the salt flats and walk around the city.

title: (3750) Sernada do Vouga - R. Parque Fluvial
title_short: (3750) Sernada do Vouga - R. Parque Fluvial
description: Nice picnic area by the river. Lots of space, shade trees, picnic tables and trash cans. Access: follow sign to the fishing spot after the bridge.

title: (3800) Eixo - 2 Rua do Doutor Reis Lima
title_short: (3800) Eixo - 2 Rua do Doutor Reis Lima
description: Nice park with parking

title: (3770-355) Palhaça - 8 Rua Arlete
description:
Service area, with 3 seats available
free services
Barbecue grills with dishwasher and picnic tables

title: (3780) Mogofores -
description: At a dilapidated house in a roundabout at a dead end! Very little traffic, the nearby train line can be heard, but it didn't bother us! We stood one night, slept restfully! Something dirty!

title: (3850-065) Albergaria-a-Velha - nº5 Rua Hospital
description: Public park to visit the Torreão and the Municipal Library and other monuments, downtown. We can also park to sleep. Quiet and well lit area.

title: (3850-073) Albergaria-a-Velha - 11A Rua Doutor José Henriques
description: Laundry open 24 hours. Simple and cheap. Next to the old fire station

title: (3475) Ramalhal - N230
description: Pick nick

title: (3850) Albergaria-a-Velha - CM1462
description: Estuval picnic park, with green areas, tables and chairs and barbecue. Fountain with drinking water. Very pleasant area with night lighting.

title: (3850-289) Albergaria-a-Velha - 16 N16
description: They swapped our swedish propane bottle to a portuguese one and also got a clip-on adapter

name: Lavandaria Self Service Clean2you Azurva
title: (3800-747) Lavandaria Self Service Clean2you Azurva
description: Lavandaria Self Service Clean2you Azurva - efficient launderette, machines very clean. 60, 45, 30 degrees and cold wash program. 2x 9kg machine, 1x 19kg. 3x 19kg dryers. Big plus point, because MTV is running on the small TV, which at least throws children from the 90s back in time a few years :D we just parked below on the side of the road, there is not much going on. There is a small supermarket opposite, and there is a coffee machine in the salon. Detergent included in the machine.

title: (3800-045) - 65 Rua da Liberdade
description: BBQ table and games for children along a pretty little river. Very good for lunch. Disposable trash

title: (3850-027) Albergaria-a-Velha - 44 Rua da Carvoeira
description: Quiet parking place near some villas. Very close from the major north/south road. Albergaria-a-Velha it’s a nice town for shopping groceries or other services. I stopped here a few times.

title: (3800) Cacia - Rua Campo
description: Excellent green area to spend time and relax, we spent the night and a whole day there .... truly a special place. ALWAYS LEAVE CLEAN!

title: (3800) Eixo - A25
description: Parking oposite to the sports center.

title: (3850) Angeja - 28 N230-2
description:
Good on the highway but also in a river.
It has drinking water, bathrooms, and tables to eat, although the bathrooms are closed.

title: (3850-835) - N16-3
description: A beautiful spot to take time in the middle of the trip, have snacks, and maybe swim in the nice river.

title: (3850) Albergaria-a-Velha - 3850 N1
description: Petrol station with lpg at cheap price, friendly staff, speak some English.

title: (3780) Anadia - 154 IC2
description: Picnic park with tables, umbrellas, drinking water and toilet (old but working). Picnic tables, new, made of concrete. Terrain impassable after rain.

title: (3780-541) Curia - A Rua Plátanos
description: Pato's Lounge self-service laundry. Possibility to park around easily, even for a large size. WiFi code > patoslounge. Very well kept, new machine. Cash payment only. Electrical outlet available to charge phone or computer.

title: (3750-561) Macieira de Alcôba - Unnamed Road
description: Small quiet corner at the exit of the village with a large stone swimming pool in the shape of a circle. Quite nice hike start. Drinking water from a natural spring. No installation provided for Motorhome. No trade in the village.

title: (3780-541) - 4 Rua Tílias
description: Parking with WC. Perfect to visit Curia, the thermal gardens.

title: (3850) Albergaria-a-Velha - 3850 N1
description: Pingo Dice with self-service laundry and car wash. WiFi in the store and in the Burger King next to it.

title: (3800) Cacia - 9 Largo de São Simão
description: It is a small picnic area, where there are two tables and a fountain. I imagine it can be done overnight. Me when I stopped to make myself something to eat and there was an AC parked

title: (3850) Albergaria-a-Velha - EM556
description: Parking is near the road but in the woods, there is no service, several places, in the shade and fallow but very suitable and especially accessible.

title: (3740) - N328
description: It's a park in a calm village in front of the church.  With water.

title: (3740) Paradela - 410 N328
description: Carpark a few metres from the ciclopista and the praia fluvial. carpark used by employees of the company next door. empty during the weekend.cars start coming in around 8.30am during the week. 2 bar/café close by on the ecopista. restaurant not open end of march. Lidl about 3km away. very quiet and nice view.

title: (3800) Aveiro - N109
description: Wait a few seconds for the pump to start. Multi language info. Not for camper more than 6m. Too much or very big door

title: () Aveiro -
description: There is a water fountain, a playground + climbing, a sports park, dogs park, picnic tables ans bbq

title: (3800-249) Aveiro - 3800 Rotunda da Forca
description: There is water at the gas station.

title: (3800-399) Aveiro - 44 Rua Dr.Orlando de Oliveria
description: Aveiro Portugal small Portuguese Venice to see absolutely and rent the Moliceiro. Parking and BP service station next door. As indicated by the campers, the services no longer exist, it's more than a regular mixed parking lot

title: (3800) Aveiro - 151 Avenida Vasco Branco
description: Large authorized car park opposite the bus station (where there are toilets). pebble floor. road next to it, a little noise during the day but little traffic at night so quiet.

title: (3800-281) Aveiro - 135 Rua de Viseu
description: Lavandería Self Service - Clean it Mid-October, we found a place in front without problem. Laundry small but effective. Provide coins.

title: (3810) Aveiro - 27 Rua do Sacobão
description: Mercadona supermarket, has two areas to park motorhomes

title: (3800) Aveiro - 3800
description: Public parking nr P5 with reserved places for motorhomes and service area with all services (free) except electricity. There is big supermarket 200 m away. Taxi and train stop 100 m away. The city center (canal area) is a 20 minute walk away. Cross underpass train line and then continue along the main avenue (Lourenço Peixinho) till the end (bridge over channel). If P full, search gravel one on other side of street.

title: (3800-011) Aveiro - 9 Rua Cerâmica do Vouga
description: Lavanderia self service laundry salon Laundromat, vending machine available, wireless / WIKI free, garbage containers - containers for other waste on the doorstep. 40 to 50 parking spaces on site, a few are suitable for Rückwärteinparken (camper overhang). Pets not allowed.

title: (3800) Aveiro - 4 Rua do Bairro do Vouga
title_short: (3800) Aveiro - 4 Rua do Bairro do Vouga
description: Parking P1 of the bus station. Best option when the nearby area is full. More places to park and tranquility.

title: (3475) São João do Monte - Rua do Prado
title_short: (3475) São João do Monte - Rua do Prado
description: Quiet place to spend the night, around a beautiful pond. Stone table fitted on site. Easy access path in a non-4x4 VW van. A couple came by around 9 p.m. walking their dog, he greeted us kindly, and continued on his way without reproaching us.

title: (3800) Aveiro - 1 Rua Carlos Silva Melo Guimarães
title_short: (3800) Aveiro - 1 Rua Carlos Silva Melo Guimarães
description: Other parking for the day, 2 euros a day (from 8 to 20h), in front of the old ceramic factory (now it's the town hall), possibility to park in reverse and overflow on the grass , nice place (less creepy than other car parks). Possibility to take the barges 100m (on the other side of the water basin facing the parking) for 10 euros per person (45 minutes of walk / discovery, the guides speak French) it's worth it, to do!

title: () Aveiro - Rua José Afonso
description: Free parking day and night located along the river, about 1 km from the city center. 500 m away you will find a kiosk where you can borrow bicycles for free for the day, no deposit only a piece of identification, type life card or student card, obviously no service kiosk.

title: (3810-164) Aveiro - 19 Rua Sebastião de Magalhães Lima
title_short: (3810-164) Aveiro - 19 Rua Sebastião de Magalhães Lima
description: Parking street Pe Armenio albedo da Costa JR large square after passing in front of the old ceramic factory. Free parking and 300m from the city center. Very well

title: (3830-046) Ílhavo - Parque Urbano da Senhora do Pranto
title_short: (3830-046) Ílhavo - Parque Urbano da Senhora do Pranto
description: Located in the parking lot of the Ílhavo municipal market. Service area with 4 parking spaces. The installation is fine, the access has no difficulties but the water supply has to be paid for. During the paid time, the clean water tank can be filled at the same time as the chemical toilet is cleaned. If the drainage is free. It opened in April 2019.

address.street: Parque Urbano da Senhora do Pranto

title: (3810-164) Aveiro - 19 Rua Sebastião de Magalhães Lima
title_short: (3810-164) Aveiro - 19 Rua Sebastião de Magalhães Lima
description: Free parking day and night high, overlooking the lake, with residences in front but do not disturb and we do not seem to disturb either. The town 5min walk, and FREE bicycles available. Very busy day because city very close. Train line against low that can disturb some. We had a quiet night.

title: (3810-414) Aveiro - 52 Rua Conselheiro Queiróz
description: Hiper Mini Market with gas station and gas. You have 6 adapters there. Very helpful and friendly. delicious coffee and cake. Washing machine and right there next to a well-known citizen snack bar.

title: (3830-046) Ílhavo - n°11 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Pranto
title_short: (3830-046) Ílhavo - n°11 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Pranto
description: Self service laundry.  3 washing machines and 2 dryers, plus 1 set for washing pet clothes.  Open every day from 7:00 am to 10:00 pm.  It has a coin exchange machine.

address.street: n°11 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Pranto

title: (3800) Aveiro - 32 Rua José Afonso
description: Free parking, very close to the center.

title: (3800-365) Aveiro - n°59 Avenida dos Congressos da Oposição Democrática
title_short: (3800-365) Aveiro - n°59 Avenida dos Congressos da Oposição Democrática
description: Close to the center, free parking lot with a few shady spots.

address.street: n°59 Avenida dos Congressos da Oposição Democrática

title: (3800-162) Aveiro - 70A Rua Comandante Rocha e Cunha
title_short: (3800-162) Aveiro - 70A Rua Comandante Rocha e Cunha
description: Large and quiet parking, you always have free places, you can sleep in a camper or motorhome quietly. Merdadona 500m and 10 minutes walk from the center (port)

title: (3475) São João do Monte - 79 Rua Dona Beatriz
title_short: (3475) São João do Monte - 79 Rua Dona Beatriz
description: São João do Monte. Large parking next to a park with trees. Tables, BBQ, water (tap on the speaker on the parking side). Main interest: nice little river bath well equipped (WC and showers open today) 100 m below. Between Àgueda and Tondela (southwest of Viseu). Disadvantage: 25 km of winding road (N 230) Easier access by exit 12 of the A 25 (Campia).

title: (3865) Fermelã - Rua do Vale
description: Free space near water, very quiet location

title: (3810-193) Aveiro - 22 Rua das Pombas
description: Parking next to Mac do, 30 minutes walk from the city. To visit, and can be spend the night.

title: (3740) Sever do Vouga -
description: There is a small parking bay right by the old mines "Parque das Minas do Braçal". Very quiet, you can only hear the river. Further back in the facilities, there is also a small waterfall. There is nothing outside of nature here. Take your rubbish back with you. Thank you. It is of course not for large motorhomes, just for vans and smaller ones. The way need patience.

title: (3810-193) Aveiro - 85 Rua de Estarreja
description: Quiet overnight parking area that fills up with cars in the morning

title: (3800-306) Aveiro - 55 Rua de Santa Luzia
description: Car park on the wooden plank hiking trail directly on the Aveiro lagoon. Motorway from afar, joggers and walkers parked in the morning.

title: (3810) Aveiro - Universidade de Aveiro
description: Free parking a few minutes from the center, next to the athletics track but quiet and less noisy than the parking next to the bridge. Maybe quieter near the pavilion.

title: (3810-064) Aveiro - 10 Rua do Batalhão de Caçadores
title_short: (3810-064) Aveiro - 10 Rua do Batalhão de Caçadores
description: Simple parking a few places with parking meter payment

title: (3800-351) Aveiro - 43 Rua António da Rocha Madail
title_short: (3800-351) Aveiro - 43 Rua António da Rocha Madail
description: Spacious laundry, very clean with small space for children. I recommend.

title: (3810-064) Aveiro - 10 Rua do Batalhão de Caçadores
title_short: (3810-064) Aveiro - 10 Rua do Batalhão de Caçadores
description: Free parking

title: (3740) Sever do Vouga - 217 Avenida Comendador Augusto Martins Pereira
title_short: (3740) Sever do Vouga - 217 Avenida Comendador Augusto Martins Pereira
description: Next to the municipal swimming pools

title: (3810-164) Aveiro -
description: Paid parking. There was much room with shadows, but the students were on vacation. The same during the course there are not so many free sites. Park very close to walk the dog. The center 10 minutes away. No services, but there is a bar in the same parking lot that opens at 09:00.

title: (3810-164) Aveiro - 7 Rua do Professor Egas Moniz
title_short: (3810-164) Aveiro - 7 Rua do Professor Egas Moniz
description: Parking in parking zone B on busy road, charges from 9am-8pm. At 6.5m, we were able to park well across the street. Small park with playground, café and kiosk. On a Monday afternoon we were able to find a parking space without any problems, despite the university being nearby. All other places were crowded. About 10 minutes walk to the canal and the historical center, no problem with the stroller. We didn't stay overnight.

title: (3800) Cacia -
description: It's a small car park at the end of a road. It gives access to a walk on a wooden footbridge. The area is very quiet with hikers passing. I'm not sure that motorhomes can get there.

title: (3810-164) Aveiro - 18A Rua Magalhães Serrão
description: Parking for short mobile homes - very good local bakery

title: (3740) Sever do Vouga - 15 Rua da Igreja
title_short: (3740) Sever do Vouga - 15 Rua da Igreja
description: Nice, quite place ideal for day or overnight. At the city park with lots of playing for kids. 2m walk from city center with many shops around. (Shade in the Summer). don’t miss the river beach at Pessegueiro do Vouga

title: (3810-193) Aveiro - 69 R. da Pega
description: Parking along the university with a magnificent view of the Lagoon. Room, but I went during the university holidays.

title: (3810-073) Aveiro - 1 Cais da Malhada
description: Parking with small spaces, free and 10 minutes from the center. It is a residential area, without services. It seemed safe.

title: (3850-703) Ribeira de Fráguas - EM553
description: PARQUE DE MERENDAS - RIBEIRA DE FRÁGUAS Fantastic place to make a stop. Picnic area by the river. It has tables, wastebaskets, grills and even a net to play volley / badminton. It has bathrooms (super clean) and outside a sink with a handle tap. A small walking route along the very cool river also leaves from this picnic area.

title: (3810-164) Aveiro - 16 Cais do Paraiso
description: Near the canals, and the center, we spent 1 night there without problem. Calm night. Do not park near the garbage cans because you will hear the passage of garbage trucks around midnight ... We liked the location and the calm, and we felt safe there. I recommend.

title: (3810-164) Aveiro - Rua do Alavário
description: Parking near the city center and the canal to park camper or van. Free. A lot of passage and visible from the road so reassuring for safety.

title: (3740) Sever do Vouga - 42 Avenida Comendador Augusto Martins Pereira
title_short: (3740) Sever do Vouga - 42 Avenida Comendador Augusto Martins Pereira
description: Small launderette with dryer very clean and maintained.  Attention choose the program before starting otherwise it chooses by default. A very nice manager is on site but only speaks Portuguese.

title: (3800) Cacia -
description: Beautiful place in nature near the water. There are all kinds of walking routes here, which is why some walkers and runners pass by. But great place for one or two nights with a nice view over ria de aveiro. Place for small campervans

title: (3840-436) Vagos - 6 Rua dos Bombeiros Voluntários de Vagos
title_short: (3840-436) Vagos - 6 Rua dos Bombeiros Voluntários de Vagos
description: Large car park on the edge of a park. No supply. Nice view of the river.

address.street: 6 Rua dos Bombeiros Voluntários de Vagos

title: (3740) Sever do Vouga - 640 Rua de Paçô
title_short: (3740) Sever do Vouga - 640 Rua de Paçô
description: Old Cedrim train station with 3 parking spaces and 2 more for the disabled. The entrance is somewhat narrow for a motorhome, not recommended for trailers narrow area to maneuver.

title: (3830) Ílhavo - 132A N109
description: Intermarche without emptying only filled with water

title: () Aveiro - A25
description:
This area is singposted from the highway which goes under the A25. Huge area beneath the railway line beside the canal. Short walk to the city.
Excellent spot to stop during the day. Room for 50 vans to park.
A quick walk under the over pass by the canal into the center of the old town. This is not the place to stay over night however as the noise from the toll way never seems to stop.

title: (3800-350) Aveiro - 4 Rua Doutor Bernardino Machado
description: Open space near the center of the city. We have only parked during the day to visit the city. It seems unsafe for us at night.

title: (3800) Cacia -
description: Easy to access, free and quiet place in the middle of nature within the saltworks. Near a pontoon allowing you to reach Aveiro in 25 minutes by bike.

title: (3840-553) Santo André -
description: Fresh water for refueling to the left of the gas station. Height limit 2.80m.

title: (3740) Sever do Vouga - R. da Escola Profa. Ema Pato
title_short: (3740) Sever do Vouga - R. da Escola Profa. Ema Pato
description: Forecourt of a small chapel with centuries-old olive trees. Drinking water tap next door. Access a bit complicated: it's easier to get in and out in reverse.

address.street: R. da Escola Profa. Ema Pato

title: (3800-180) Aveiro - 8 Rua Doutor Bernardino Machado
description: Free day parking lot of space and always ideal passage to spend a few hours in the city

title: (3800) Vera Cruz - Rua do Sal
description: Dirt parking called the "old fishing auction" of Aveiro, next to the Ria de Aveiro channel, in front of the pleasure craft pier; good place to spend a day or two and stay overnight; close to the City (about one kilometer).

title: (3830) Ílhavo - 3830 Via da Vista Alegre
description: Picnic area with bbq, water, shaded benches and chairs, playground, outdoor gym, bathrooms (they were closed), parking with a little shade and a walk next to the river with birds. It smells good and there are not many flies.

title: (3840-560) Santo André - 87 N109
description: Not ideal, but a rest area for lunch or a little sleep in an area where places to park a motor home are very few. Some noise from the road of course but not unbearable inside the camping car.

title: (3050-356) Mealhada - 120 Avenida Floresta
description: Very nice, parking on large park

title: (3865) Salreu - 50 Rua do Cadaval
description: Parking of the Interpretative Centre of Ria de Aveiro. Plenty of space for parking. Big picnic area with shade. Possible to rent bikes for full day, half day or 1 hour. Lovely paths for walking or biking. To sleep, better on the small road on the left of the canal, near the football field. Weekends may be busy.

title: () Luso - N235
description: Parking to visit the very pretty forest of Bucasso. You can spend all day there (bus parking). Prohibited at night.

title: (3840) Vagos - Rua de Cantanhede
description: Vagos 1km from the center tarmac, shady, quiet parking

title: (3475) - Unnamed Road
description: A small uneven parking lot for hikers at 1006m altitude on the road just below the summit of Caramulinho (1075 m). There is a large trash can and picnic table with a great view. Fire is forbidden and please respect the fauna and flora. A really quiet place with no through traffic. An approximately 8 km (approx. 2.5 h) long circular hiking trail also begins.

title: (3050-263) Luso - 45 Rua Engarrafamento
description: Asphalted parking with some unevenness next to the lake and the center. super quiet almost without traffic. playground at 50mts

title: (3050-261) Luso - 20 Viela Padre Francisco Branco
description: Note: access is via Rua António Granjo (= N 235 road) with unique sense. Large free parking inside village center, asphalted and well illuminated at night, including several lots for buses, quiet enough at night. Central places free of trees/shadows. Easy pedestrian access to this iconic thermal village, which main fountain (table fresh water) has free access to fill. No services.

title: (3680) Ribeiradio - CM1269
description: Quiet park to rest. Surrounded by nature. The water

title: (3050-261) Luso - 26 Avenida dos Castanheiros
description: Very quiet parking close to the center. It seems to be possible to spend a night. I strongly advise

name: Parque de Campismo De Luso
title: (3050) Parque de Campismo De Luso
description: Camping Luso, small, clean and quiet.

address.street: R. Dr. José Troncho de Melo 285

title: (3740) - 82 Rua da Pereira
description:
Small cars only!
Parking in front of 2 bars. You can make a route to see the Cabreia waterfall where you can bathe.

title: (3050-245) Luso - 54 Rua Doutor Assis Leão
description: Super nice and quiet to spend a day and night. Very close to Termas do Luso and the well renown Fonte de S. João.

title: (3830-741) Gafanha da Nazaré - 360 Avenida dos Bacalhoeiros
title_short: (3830-741) Gafanha da Nazaré - 360 Avenida dos Bacalhoeiros
description: Gas station where you can fill up your gas bottle if you have the appropriate adapter with you.

title: (3050) Mealhada - 44 Rua Murtal
description: Right in front of the municipal swimming pool, which is very nice. The staff there is also extremely friendly and helpful.

title: (3050-224) Luso - 25 Rua Emídio Navarro
description: Fountain of Luso to fill cans with drinking water

title: (3740) - Rua de Nossa Senhora da Penha
title_short: (3740)  - Rua de Nossa Senhora da Penha
description: Very nice place with all over the valley and the sea in the sun unfortunately it was raining. Calm spent one night, WC present but closed.

address.street: Rua de Nossa Senhora da Penha

title: (3050) Luso - 1 Avenida Emídio Navarro
description: Parking next to public services.

title: (3865) Salreu - Autoestrada do Norte
description: Noisy service area because there are many trucks. The cafeteria staff is quite rude. Clean bathrooms. BEWARE: if you stop to sleep and entertain yourself because you have breakfast and go with three children and a dog, you have made a mess, because as long as you spend 12 hours, at the exit of the toll from Porto, you will be struck 90 euros.

title: (3050-323) Mealhada - 36 Rua Padeiras da Mealhada
description: Very quiet park, next to, ALAMEDA DA CIDADE, Lidl at 200 m, Intermarché at 600 m.

title: (3680) Ribeiradio - N16
description: Very quiet place to stay. Coffee and mini market nearby.

title: (3840) Pte. de Vagos - R. do Pq. de Merendas
title_short: (3840) Pte. de Vagos - R. do Pq. de Merendas
description: Good place to stay with toilets, barbecue, lavaloicas, tables and large park. Good picnic area.

title: (3050) Luso - N336
description: Quiet parking

title: (3860-367) Estarreja - 72 Rua dos Bombeiros Voluntários
description: Parking area near the center but off the road with wooded area and park next door. Gas station on top

title: (3050) Luso - Estrada Florestal
description: If you like contact with nature, this is an ideal place, the most beautiful region of Portugal. The Grand Hotel near the park. The view at the top of the mountain is divine.

title: (3860-249) Estarreja - Rua Doutor António Madureira
description:
Beautiful official parking space of the municipality on the outskirts of the city at the park. Ver, disposal free of charge possible. Maximum length of stay 48 hours with electricity. The places with electricity are cordoned off by iron beams. In 200 meters in the Cafe Piscina (along the orange pillars at the meat shop directly to the left of the building passage) you will receive two keys from the friendly staff after entering the license plate number.
One for the iron beam and one for the electrical box. To be returned after 48 hours on a trust basis. Muito obrigada!!

title: (3860-352) Estarreja - 61 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Self service laundry. Brand new. Really clean and well organized. Prices are 4e for 10.5kg and 1.5e for 15 min for drying. FYI, it’s three doors from the “cafe piscina” where you can get the keys for the caravan service area. Safe trip =)

title: (3830) Gafanha da Nazaré - Rua da Piscina
title_short: (3830) Gafanha da Nazaré - Rua da Piscina
description: Park of the municipal swimming pool, silent, illuminated and with many places available. There are no obvious prohibition signs. Possibility to use the swimming pool. Beautiful place.

title: (3050-261) Luso - Estrada Florestal
description: Car park P3 Buçaco, the only one where you can park and spend the night with an AC.  The P1 is disabled and also closed at night, and the P2 is small, only for cars.  Very quiet night, without problems or noise, and overlooking the palace-hotel of Buçaco.

name: Cordeiro's Farm
title: (3840) Cordeiro's Farm
description: Cordeiro’s Farm is a family owned organic blackberry farm. Surrounded by nature, here you can escape from the big city noises, take a break from the daily routine and emerge in a place full of good energy. Bring your kids, your pets and enjoy a restful night under a starry sky.

title: (3860-362) Estarreja - R. Des. Correia Teles
description: Laundromat

title: (3720-411) Palmaz - Rua dos 22
description: Place in the heart of nature, in the middle of the woods, where total calm reigns. Possibility of finding another place in this maze of paths. Completely passable.

title: (3450) Luso - 6 N234-4
description: Large free flat parking located at the Sula Gate. Some places in the shade. direct access to the Bucaco estate (beautiful). We parked the day but could stay there for the night. No service.

title: (3830) Gafanha da Nazaré - 203 Rua Gago Coutinho
title_short: (3830) Gafanha da Nazaré - 203 Rua Gago Coutinho
description: We found a 907 camping gas bottle at Casa Osorio for 13 euros in January 2022.

title: (3670) Campia - CM1282-1
description: Nice area by the river with picnic table shaded, barbecue available, suitable for fishermen, very good water quality. small sandy beach and grass on the shady river. we hear the cars passed from the highway but not disturbing.

title: (3050) Luso - Unnamed Road
description: It is forbidden to spend the night there. the park closes the gates

title: (3830) Gafanha da Encarnação -
description: Nice place to wash and clean your motorhome! With some services and vending machines!

title: (3475) - 100 Rua Outeirinho
description: Water tap can be easily approached with campers. According to the label, it is not controlled drinking water. According to information from the villagers, it is spring water. Here in town water is bottled and sold. Nearby behind the sports bar it has a gray and black water disposal.

title: (3475-031) Caramulo - Rua Jean Lucart
description: Nice village with typical shops, very quiet, 120 m from the Coimbra Museum.

title: (3680) Oliveira de Frades - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place for meditation under a large oak tree on a dolmen hill. Also accessible via dirt road for large mobile homes xxl. Very good turnaround. Going around the hill to make a turn is quite possible. Unfortunately, the entrance to the inside of the dolmen is not accessible. But a quiet retreat for nature lovers.

title: () - N234-4
description: Abandoned picnic area, perfect for overnight

title: (3060-424) Murtede - 16 Rua Fonte
description: Picnic area, 2 tables and a trash can. At the bottom of a large earthen car park, far from the road anyway. Possibility to park CCs, even long ones. No prohibition.

title: (3860-335) Estarreja - 13 Rua Almeida de Eça
description: Small parking lot near a nice neighbourhood, with a park, a coffee shop and a playground

title: (3450) Moura - N234
description: Hidden in the trees, perfect for the night, free, no service.

title: (3720) Pinheiro da Bemposta - 850 IC2
description: It is a picnic area with a lot of shade, it has a barbecue area and tables to eat in the shade of the trees. It also has ample parking for a motorhome and access is easy to get to.

title: (3475-031) - ES Rua Doutor Manuel de Arriaga
title_short: (3475-031)  - ES Rua Doutor Manuel de Arriaga
description: Car park of a former closed public establishment and of a former club. Flat and tarred place, easy access by N230 or N230. 3. Shops at 350 m, Museum and toilets at 200 m. Quiet and safe place, calm night. On the passage of a short hike loop (PR1) of 7.4 km to discover the environment of Caramulo. Breathtaking view over the plain.

address.street: ES Rua Doutor Manuel de Arriaga

title: (3740-418) Dornelas - Unnamed Road
description: Great little spot by the creek. Quiet and peaceful with a few spots for campers and motor homes. There is water and picnic tables but the toilets were locked when we were here. There is a gorgeous hike to an amazing waterfall nearby. There was nobody there when we went and it was magic. This place is a hidden gem, incl public toilets with toilet paper. enormous amount of benches and public bbq's

title: (3680) Arcozelo das Maias - Rua da Estação
title_short: (3680) Arcozelo das Maias - Rua da Estação
description:
Small car park next to the old station for 2 or 3 quiet flat motorhomes accessible to any size motorhome
Departure of hiking or cycling the old railway line is equipped for bicycles and pedestrians
Ideal for nature lovers

title: (3830) Gafanha da Nazaré - 4 Rua da Mota
title_short: (3830) Gafanha da Nazaré - 4 Rua da Mota
description: New petrol station at Intermarché supermarket. Easy access with motorhome and no height restrictions. Water

title: (3720-475) Pinheiro da Bemposta - Rua do Garcia 322
title_short: (3720-475) Pinheiro da Bemposta - Rua do Garcia 322
description: Pitch for a campervan maximum 6 meters. 4x4 recommended (see Photo) Access to services via the adjacent mill/hostel. 200 year old lovingly but simply restored water mill, with garden, river, waterfalls, barbecue on site. Pitch a bit uneven. Shim boards are available.

title: (3860-210) Estarreja - 55 Rua Manuel Ferreira da Silva
title_short: (3860-210) Estarreja - 55 Rua Manuel Ferreira da Silva
description: Modern service station with free air and water and self service laundry there is also a car wash

title: (3860-328) Beduido - 22 Rua de Santo Amaro
description: Beautiful location, shaded and barbecue available. The only drawback is the need for drinking water tokens and no information on where to buy them ... Otherwise the rest is free.

title: (3860) Estarreja - 19 Travessa de Santo Amaro
description: Picnic area with parking space and water fountain

title: (3860) Veiros -
description: Parking only day, next to the cemetery and the estuary for hiking

title: (3870-178) Murtosa - 90A Rua Vasco da Gama
description:
Parking, in the port of CAIS DO BICO Murtosa, along a grove of trees, with a picnic area, tables and benches.
Possibility of drinking water from several taps scattered along the banks of the port, all of them with a thread to connect.
Cafeteria restaurant where you can have an aperitif or coffee. MOLICEIRO Restaurant 5*

title: (3870) Murtosa - 90A Rua Vasco da Gama
description: Praia de Bico quiet place walks or bike along the lagoon. No services except water point. Bar Restaurant.

title: (3060) Murtede - 401 N234
description: Ample parking almost next to the level river pool.

title: (3060-441) Ourentã - 7 Rua Azenha de Sete Fontes
title_short: (3060-441) Ourentã - 7 Rua Azenha de Sete Fontes
description: River pool, 1.20 maximum depth. very clean and well cared for. perfect for cooling off. Chiringuito next door. Park for children, barbecues, tables.

title: (3830) Gafanha da Nazaré - Porto de Pesca de Aveiro
title_short: (3830) Gafanha da Nazaré - Porto de Pesca de Aveiro
description: New parking for the Sante Andrè museum and the Ouidinot park. Not on Google maps but access market on the roundabout. Spent relaxed day and night. Access to WC, guarded lake beach, public sport arenas and playgrounds etc. Ample parking both sides of double access road.

name: Orbitur Vagueira
title: () Orbitur Vagueira
description: 'Orbitur' campsite, sanitary facilities and easy access, emptying, clean water, electricity.

title: (3840) Vagueira - Rua do Parque de Campismo
title_short: (3840) Vagueira - Rua do Parque de Campismo
description: Picnic park Vagos

title: (6185) Cambas -
description: It is a place where water tanks can be filled, it has a bathroom for men and another for women, and in addition to having a set of 8 tables and benches, it also has 6 barbecues where a barbecue can be lit in security; It has big buckets to put the garbage. It is not a suitable place to sleep but a place where you can stop to rest, fill up your tanks and have a barbecue in the middle of a longer trip. It is very close to Mealhada, a place where the special dish is suckling pig: a small pig roasted in the oven - a very good dish!

title: (3840) Vagos - M593
description: Shaded picnic area with WC with drinking water tap

name: MyWay Kite&Surf
title: (3830) MyWay Kite&Surf
description: Unfortunately, we at MyWay Kite & Surf (bar / hotel / school / shop) can not offer RV parks for overnight stay. However, you are welcome to use our facilities of the kite school such as shower, toilet and WLAN as well as storage (storage) for 10 EUR per person / day. In our bar there is delicious food and a variety of drinks! You have the possibility to rent our kitesurfing or SUP material or to book a kitesurfing course! We are looking forward to your visit!

title: (3840) - EM593
description: Picnic area under the trees with plenty of seating.

title: (3830-767) Gafanha da Nazaré - 19 Rua Ria Mar
title_short: (3830-767) Gafanha da Nazaré - 19 Rua Ria Mar
description: At the end of Magallanes street. Dirt parking, very wide, the street takes you directly to the lighthouse, which you can see from the parking lot, very beautiful at night. Passage of the fishermen to the sea. Beautiful views of the estuary. Pets Allowed. Suitable for cv, auto, camp and campaign.

title: (3830-751) Gafanha da Nazaré - 120 Avenida Infante Dom Henrique
title_short: (3830-751) Gafanha da Nazaré - 120 Avenida Infante Dom Henrique
description: Praia da Barra, It's possible to park and stay during the night (have a permission signal for motorhome). No other facilities but a nice and quiet place.

title: (3830-452) Gafanha da Encarnação - 134 Rua do Arrais Ança
title_short: (3830-452) Gafanha da Encarnação - 134 Rua do Arrais Ança
description: Small parking lot next to the fishing port, sheltered from the wind, for 7 m motorhome. Close to shops, buy fresh fish in fishermen's huts.

title: (3800-901) São Jacinto -
description: Calm local, fishing area, beach with areal on the side. Restaurant in the beach area. S. Jacinto Dunes Nature Reserve Interpretive Center.

title: (3800) - 99 N327
description: Unusual place to spend the night in a ruin setting, no service, no barrier, abandoned factory

title: () São Jacinto - 27 Avenida Riamar
description: Parking quiet and well located.

title: (3830) Gafanha da Encarnação - 214 Avenida José Estevão
title_short: (3830) Gafanha da Encarnação - 214 Avenida José Estevão
description: Parking inthe centre of Costa Nova do Prado

title: (3830-455) Gafanha da Encarnação - 25 Rua do Arrais Ança
title_short: (3830-455) Gafanha da Encarnação - 25 Rua do Arrais Ança
description: Public toilets in the market.

title: (3830-751) Gafanha da Nazaré - 68 Rua Ria Mar
title_short: (3830-751) Gafanha da Nazaré - 68 Rua Ria Mar
description: Small car park at the end of a dead end bordering a pedestrian promenade by the river and with a little greenery.

title: (3870) - Avenida do Emigrante
description: Big picnic area, toilet, place for barbecue, skatepark, bar, swimming pool. Parking is big, many places with shadow. possible to spend the night, nice, clean, calm.

title: (3070) Seixo - Rua dos Moliceiros
description: Beautiful picnic area 15km from Costa Nova. It has 30 picnic tables, oven, embers, BBQ, fountains, hand laundry, restrooms, playground and sports area. Very shady.

title: (3870) Murtosa - 21 Cais da Ribeira de Pardelhas
title_short: (3870) Murtosa - 21 Cais da Ribeira de Pardelhas
description:
Very quiet area with picturesque cafe 100 meters away.  Several bicycles available at no cost, place with shaded tables for
 picnic, public toilet.  Excellent spot.

title: (3830-451) Gafanha da Encarnação - 58 Avenida da Bela Vista
title_short: (3830-451) Gafanha da Encarnação - 58 Avenida da Bela Vista
description: Laundromat 2 dry linen 16kg and 3 lava linen 11kg the laundry seems to be integrated into the program to be confirmed. recent and modern establishment with wifi. payment only by pieces

name: Camping Costa Nova
title: (3830) Camping Costa Nova
description: Very simple, basic but convivial family campsite between the Aveiro estuary and the ocean, at 100 m direct access to the immense beach, between the picturesque village of Costa Nova and its colorful houses at 3 km by bike path and Le village of Vagueira with its fishermen who leave their nets on the beach every morning.

title: (3830) Gafanha da Encarnação - 113 Avenida Nossa Senhora da Saúde
title_short: (3830) Gafanha da Encarnação - 113 Avenida Nossa Senhora da Saúde
description: Picnic tables feet in the sand. 100m from the beach. Nearby toilets - Parking spaces - Bins - Selective sorting.

title: (3830) Gafanha da Encarnação - 3 Avenida José Estevão
title_short: (3830) Gafanha da Encarnação - 3 Avenida José Estevão
description: Spacious and quiet parking for overnight, the beach is about 100 meters past a few dunes

name: Camper Parking Gafanha da Encarnação
title: (3830) Camper Parking Gafanha da Encarnação
description: Paid parking, with services, just behind the Duin. Quiet place to spend the night, there is a bar with friendly people. There is also a bathroom, you have to ask for the key at the bar counter. Further up there are restaurants within walking distance.

title: (3830) Gafanha da Encarnação - 56 Avenida Nossa Senhora da Saúde
title_short: (3830) Gafanha da Encarnação - 56 Avenida Nossa Senhora da Saúde
description: Parking to spend the day on the beach right at the entrance of the small wooden walk and sand, without any service

title: (3830-751) Gafanha da Nazaré - 263 Avenida João Corte Real
title_short: (3830-751) Gafanha da Nazaré - 263 Avenida João Corte Real
description: Day and night parking, paved and flat. only for parking. It is well lit and during the day services are available at the nearby beach access. There were more caravans and we felt safe. Close to town and close to the exit to Aveiro. We slept two nights barely feeling the noise and listening to the sea. Free and 34 parking spaces.

title: (3830-751) Gafanha da Nazaré - 257 Avenida João Corte Real
title_short: (3830-751) Gafanha da Nazaré - 257 Avenida João Corte Real
description: Self-service laundry, also has personalized attention, if you do not want to waste your time all day in the laundry you can leave your clothes to be treated and take advantage of the walk to the beach.

name: Parque de Campismo - Praia da Barra
title: (3830) Parque de Campismo - Praia da Barra
title_short: (3830) Parque de Campismo - Praia da Barra
description: Parque De Campismo Da Praia Da Barra. Good location but the area reserved for RVs is on the road side and is very narrow. zero camping! old-fashioned! Being a residential area, this isn't too inconvenient. the place consists almost exclusively of long-term campers, in unkempt tents ... Reception limited to a minimum. Old sanitary facilities. Two service areas for motorhomes. One more thing: the bar pizzas are right!

title: (3830) Gafanha da Encarnação - 33 Avenida do Mar
title_short: (3830) Gafanha da Encarnação - 33 Avenida do Mar
description: Beautiful location, just behind the last dune before the Atlantic Ocean. In front of the beach a very good and quiet location, set back from the road. Heavily used by locals on the weekends, but virtually empty during the week. No facilities, but with the feeling of being completely outside. Village and facilities by bike and if necessary within walking distance. They added a beach bar with outdoor showers and public toilets. They have also let us plug in devices to charge and it has WiFi.

title: (3830-454) Gafanha da Encarnação - 9 Rua da Quinta do Cravo
title_short: (3830-454) Gafanha da Encarnação - 9 Rua da Quinta do Cravo
description: Parking along the beach at the edge of the street: deserted in the off season. Ideal for enjoying the immensity of the nearby beach!
